example.description: This request disables support for DNS hostnames in the VPC with the ID vpc-1a2b3c4d. Specify '-EnableDnsHostnames $true' to enable support.

This request disables support for DNS resolution in the VPC with the ID vpc-1a2b3c4d. Specify '-EnableDnsSupport $true' to enable support. If this attribute is true, the Amazon DNS server resolves DNS hostnames for your instances to their corresponding IP addresses; otherwise, it does not.
